info.name: Minimal and Dark Google v1.3
info.description:
It's a simple and clean code for make Google minimal and dark. Old Google design was so white and complicated. I've redesigned it for searchers and minimal brains :) 
send me mail or open discussion for bugs: fertagram@gmail.com
info.additionalInfo:
+ v.1.3
- I'm using normalize.css for compatible with all browsers now. ( Open discussion or mail me if you have problem with this.
- I've changed link colors. 
- Cleaned some Google shits too. 


+ v.1.1.0
- Text colour which is in the searcbox is more white now.
- Auto completion is enabled again.
- Fix some details for search results. 

#################
- Changed all colors.
- More minimal and artistic bottom navigation.
- Deleted useless bottoms. 
- Deleted Google logo. 
- Deleted top navigation. If you want to go to Gmail or something, type gmail.com. That's all. 
- Deleted ALL ads.
- And more...
